name: The ninja box
description:
"The ninja box" is a top-shot minimalistic modern platformer game. Play as ninja-box who fights boxes of other colors! 

Each ninja-box is distinguished not only by its color, but also by its ability, attack and behavior on the battlefield. Watch out for collisions with the enemy and their shots! 

Control your character's the movement, jumping and shooting abilities to eliminate all your enemies and remain safe and sound! 

Train your accuracy and reaction! Every battle is fast and dynamic. But be careful: with every level you clear, your enemies become stronger and deadlier. 

And the best part: this game is absolutely FREE!
